headline: Assessing Hewlett Packard Enterprise (HPE) Valuation After Recent Share Price Gains And Juniper Integration Plans
summary: Why Hewlett Packard Enterprise (HPE) is on investors’ radar today Hewlett Packard Enterprise (HPE) has drawn fresh attention as investors weigh its recent share performance, including a 1 day gain of 1.25% compared with weaker moves over the past month and past 3 months. See our latest analysis for Hewlett Packard Enterprise. That 1 day 1.25% share price gain to US$20.25 comes after a softer patch, with a 7 day share price return of 7.83% and a year to date share price return of 16.22%. The 1...

headline: Can HPE’s New AI-Native Network Push Redefine Its Full-Stack Strategy and Margin Profile (HPE)?
summary: Earlier in February 2026, Hewlett Packard Enterprise unveiled new AI-native networking and compute solutions, integrating Juniper Networks technology to help service providers build low-latency, high-capacity infrastructure from core to edge, supported by new HPE ProLiant Gen12 servers, Cloud Ops Software and flexible HPE Financial Services financing. This launch underlines HPE’s push to become a full-stack AI and networking infrastructure provider, using Juniper integration and automation...
